title: Avail Oct 1 to Nov 28 / Home Office / Garden Firepit / Near Hospitals
posting_body: ['**Available on October 1st, 2022 through November 28th, 2022.', 'Two month stay.', '**', 'Virtual tour: <URL>', 'Rent - $4,150/mo', 'Application Fee - $40.00 per person.', 'Cleaning Fee - $200.00', 'Damage Deposit - $2,500.00', '=========', 'INTRO =============', 'I am offering this furnished home for leases of 1-3 months - perfect for traveling medical professionals or others needing a temporary stay.', 'Renovated 3 bed, 2 bath, ~950 square foot house in the up-and-coming NOBE neighborhood, featuring a lush backyard garden with lounge chairs (and a firepit!).', 'Perfect for a small family or a group of two or three friends.', '=========', 'THE SPACE =============', '- The home was renovated in 2021 with new floors, new paint, updated fully-equipped kitchen, stainless steel appliances (including a gas stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher).', '- Sunny front bedroom setup as a home office with desk, smart TV.', 'Or use it as a yoga/exercise room.', 'Features a small sleeper sofa and closet.', '- Living room with large smart TV, sleeper sofa.', '- Master bedroom with queen bed, two bedside tables with lamps, large closet.', '- Second bedroom with full bed, smart TV, two bedside tables with lamps, closet.', '- Backyard with firepit and garden, passionfruit vines, fruit trees, fruit bushes, and lounge chairs for basking in the sun.', '- On-site washer and dryer included.', '- Walkable and convenient neighborhood with easy access to restaurants, cafes, bars, parks.', '- Great location for traveling medical professionals: close to many local hospitals.', '- Reliable wi-fi for streaming & web surfing.', '=========', 'OTHER THINGS TO NOTE =============', 'HOME:', 'This home is part of a duplex with a front entry.', 'Owner (Me, Eric) lives in the upstairs unit.', 'The yard is a shared space with the owner.', 'NEIGHBORHOOD:', 'The neighborhood is semi-industrial and there is some truck/forklift noise from a nearby warehouse.', "(I work from home and it doesn't bother me; usually I'm listening to music so I barely hear it.)", 'PARKING:', 'There is one off-street parking spot in front of the house that you can use, if desired.', "There's also ample street parking.", 'AMENITIES:', 'As this is a long-term stay, you will be responsible for providing your own paper towels and toilet paper, soap/shampoo, cooking oil, etc.', 'I will of course provide some upon check-in to get you started though!', 'PETS:', 'There are currently no pets living on the property.', 'You may bring one small, non-shedding, well-behaved cat or dog for an extra $500 deposit and an extra $75/month pet rent.', 'I just ask that you please pick up after them and dont allow them to chew on or scratch the furniture!', '========= AREA =============', '- Walkers paradise (Walk Score 91).', '- Good transit (Transit Score 60).', '- Bikers paradise (Bike Score 99).', '- Located in the central, up-and-coming NOBE (North Oakland, Emeryville, Berkeley) neighborhood.', 'A vibrant hybrid industrial and residential area with tons of great street art, abundant gardens and cool workshops.', '- Walking distance to UCSF Benioff Hospital, Temescal Creek Park (which has a dog park), Paradise Park Cafe, Wolfhound Bar, Sideshow Kitchen and other restaurants & shops.', 'Five minute drive to the culinary delights of the Emeryville Public Market.', '- Not to mention a quick bike ride to a stunning sunset over the Golden Gate Bridge, viewed from the Emeryville Marina.', 'Public Transport:', '- AC Transit Transbay bus stop for quick transport to downtown SF (5 minute walk).', '- Ashby BART station (5 minute drive or 20 min walk)', '- Interstate 80 is quickly accessible.', '- 20 minute bike ride to UC Berkeley.', '-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'Interested?', 'Please reach out with a message introducing yourself and any other renters.', '-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------']
